choices: More Ways for him to Prove he is Serious
1.content:
“And as you can see that is why our physical appearance is directly linked to our psychological development, and in turn directly effects society as a whole.” says Aaron, the young graduate student as he delivers his Thesis.

He stands at the front of a huge auditorium classroom even though he was addressing a small group of professors taking up the first row.

“Well done Mr. Walker.” One of the professors says standing to applaud, “Ah yes truly fascinating.” Another says, “Thank you, you’re too kind.” Aaron says modestly, “Congratulations, Dr. Walker.” The head of the comity says shaking his hand. “Oh wow that’s going to take some getting used to.” Aaron says smiling.

The thesis comity members all congratulate him as they leave the room, Aaron staying behind to pack up his notes and erase the board.

Suddenly Aaron hears someone at the classroom door, “Congratulations Mr.… or should I say Doctor Walker.” The man at the door says. Aaron turns around, “Well thank you but it’s not official just yet but… hey you look familiar, have we met?” he asks the stranger, “Not officially, Michael Owens I’m a visiting sociology professor, you have probably seen me around campus.” He says shaking his hand, “I’ve seen your work, very impressive. But hey if you have time I’d love to hear your thesis.” Michael says, “Sure I was just leaving.” Aaron says putting his notes in his bag.

The two of them continue walking and talking about psychology, sociology, and the general state of the work. After circling the campus the decide to rest by the fountain.

“So you believe that people are the way they are simply because of how they look?” Michael asks, “Well not exactly, it’s a combination of nature vs. nurture, for example if someone is born into a rich family or a poor family, or if someone is born tall or short, or if someone is male or female. There are so many factors that contribute to who we become and how we see ourselves and the world. But for the most part I believe its how some people don’t understand how others feel that causes so many problems.” Aaron says

“I can respect that.” Michael says smiling, “But how would you use your theory to help the world? I mean that should be the goal of sociology right?” he asks, Aaron smiles, “Yeah I haven’t figured that our yet, but imagine if you could actually show one person the world from another’s eyes.” He says, “What do you mean?” Michael says smiling as though he knows exactly what Aaron is fixing to say, “Well take that guy over there harassing those girls.” Aaron says pointing to an obviously drunk guy trying to hook up with every girl passing by. “I know him, and trust me alcohol isn’t making him act like that. He is as sexist as it comes, now don’t ask me how someone could develop that attitude these days but he did, now imagine if he could see what it is like to be a woman and put up with guys like himself?” Aaron says. Michael smiles and says, “Yeah that would defiantly teach him a lesson.” Aaron laughing, “Yeah but fortunately for him we can’t do that.” He says

Michael then starts laughing, “Yeah too bad, so once you officially get your doctorate have you thought about a job?” he asks smiling

“Well really the only thing you can do with a doctorate in sociology is teach, so I guess I’m going to be a professor like you.” He says, “Yeah a college professor is a pretty honorable position, you get to mold young minds and hopefully guide them so that they may change the world for the better.” Michael says

“But how would you like to use your ideas to change the world a different way?” he asks smiling.

Aaron turns to him, “What do you mean?” he asks, “Well what if I told you I wasn’t a professor, and I am actually part of a secret organization that teaches world about tolerance. And you have been selected to join us?” he asks

Aaron pauses for a moment and the bursts out laughing, “Wow you almost had me there.” He says getting up to look around, “Where is everyone, is this some kind of sociology induction thing?” he asks still laughing.

Michael then stands up with a straight look on his face, “Why doesn’t anyone just believe me.” He says
1.title: Congratulations Doctor

choices: Michael has a Case, and asks if you Want to Come Along
11.content:
Michael then pulls what looks like a smart phone out of his pocket and types something. Suddenly Aaron transforms into a college girl.

http://us.cdn003.fansshare.com/photos/so...

He then notices the new height difference between the two of them; he then notices his blonde hair, and tiny white shirt that barely covered his belly.

His jaw drops as he traces his hips with his hands, “But how…” he says noticing his new voice. Michael then smiles and points to the Smartphone, “Do you believe me now?” he asks, “Yeah but how is this possible?!” he asks, “Standard issue controller, and you haven’t seen anything yet. With this I can change anything about you down to the smallest detail and give you a whole new life to go with it. Your own mother wouldn’t recognize you, but don’t worry I can give you a new mother that can show you your baby pictures.” Michael says laughing

“This is amazing! But can you change me back now? I think the thong was a little much.” He says adjusting his underwear. “Oh sorry, It’s been a while since I have recruited anyone so you got the standard case attire.” He says laughing as he types something on the control turning Aaron back to normal.

“So the whole secret organization job offer thing was true?” he asks, “That’s right, are you interested?” Michael ask, “Of course, but where did you get that kind of technology?” he asks, “Well you didn’t seriously think they let you see how advanced the worlds technology really is do you?” he says smiling, “I guess not, so you work for the government?” he asks, “No of course not, we are a completely separate entity that operates outside of any government, so that we may serve the world as a whole.” He says proudly

“The world, but how?” he asks, “Well it’s just like you said, people grow up from a certain perspective and develop narrow minded believes. Our job is to find these individuals and show them different perspectives.” He says

“But wait if that’s true how do you stay a secret?” Aaron asks, “Well that’s simple, if someone sees something they shouldn’t we just wipe their memories with this.” he says showing him his watch, “I know it looks like a watch but just set it like so and it will make everything within a certain time feel like a dream that quickly fades away, and you can tell them whatever you want. For example, if you’re not interested in joining us I just press this button and you will forget everything we have discussed since we met and ill say something like congratulations on your doctorate and you’ll never see me again.” He says smiling

“So, are you interested?” he says placing his hand on his watch, “Oh, yes I’m defiantly interested.” Aaron says. “Good, but there is one thing you have to take into consideration.” He says with a serious look on his face, “You see this is not the kind of job that you can do part time, or can tell others about. So if you accept, your existence will be erased. Though you can go anywhere in the world with any temporary identity you wish when you are not on a case, Aaron Walker will no longer exist. Your friends and family won’t remember you, you won’t leave finger prints, and everything about you will be wiped from every database on earth. But you will be able to see and do things that some people only dream of. What do you say?” he asks
11.title: He transforms Aaron

111.content:
Aaron pauses for a moment looking into the fountain, he then thinks about his life. And then runs his fingers through his short hair, finding it hard to believe that moments ago he was actually a woman. He knew that giving up his identity and leaving everyone he knew behind was a heavy price to pay, but he would get to see the world and make a difference in countless lives.

He then turns around to face Michael, “Okay, I’m in.” he says smiling, “Welcome to the Body Modification Bureau.” Michael says shaking his hand, “Now come with me.” He says.

Michael then leads him to the street corner where a taxi cab stops without even being signaled. Michael opens the door and the two of them get in and the driver takes off without even asking where they were going.

“Wow I’ve never gotten a cab this fast.” Aaron says, “But shouldn’t we tell him where were going, actually where are we going?” he asks, “Were going to headquarters and don’t worry he knows the way.” Michael says, “Here check this out.” Michael then goes to slap the driver in the back of the head but his hand does straight through him. “What the hell?” Aaron exclaims reaching up to try for himself. “It’s a hologram, the car is driving itself. But don’t worry you can get your own car in you want, taxis are just better cover when we need a ride in big cities” Michael says

“Wow.” Aaron says playing with the hologram, “Wow you’re easily amused for a college student.” He says laughing, “But you haven’t seen anything yet.” He says

Aaron then sits back in his seat. “Okay now we are going to headquarters for your orientation but I can give you a brief rundown. Okay first off everything you own up until now is being moved to a secure location, you can still treasure the memory of your old life but no one else will find any trace of it. Your apartment is going back onto the market, and we have already initiated a worldwide memory wipe so that no one will remember you and you will no longer appear in any database. Now since I recruited you, I will be your mentor. If you have any questions about anything just ask.” He says

“Okay you said I could go anywhere I want and can have a car, what happens if I get pulled over?” he asks, “Simple, whenever you leave headquarters you will be given a temporary identity with all the paperwork to prove it; license, registration, ext.” Michael answers

“Oh okay that works.” Aaron says

The car the stops in front of…
111.title: I Accept

1111.content:
“Well we’re here.” Michael says as he gets out of the car, Aaron follows to find they are outside of a small storage facility.

The two of them then walk to the back left corner and unlock a space that had was completely empty except for a park bench in the middle.

“Have a seat.” Michael says. Aaron was confused but he figured that things are not what they seem anymore, so the two of them sit down. Moments later they are sitting on a similar bench but in a white room. Michael then gets up and walks through an open door.

“Alright welcome headquarters and that was just one of our many means to get here. Since we handle cases from all over the world we must be able to be anywhere fast.” He says leading him through a larger open area that felt like the bullpen at a large company. With dozens of people that looked really busy, “Now as you have probably guessed this is our command center, you’ll get a desk right after your orientation, but for now this is mine.” He says sitting down at a desk near the middle of the room. “Now all these flat screens allow us to check on the progress of our cases and draw our attention to potential cases.” He says pointing to the flat screen TVs lining the walls of the room.

Aaron takes a moment to look at a few of the screens, showing very uncomfortable looking waitresses, cheerleaders, mothers with unruly children and more. He then sees another agent touch the screen and bring up additional information. He then touches the screen with the mother and her children to find that the mother was actually a man named Darius Franklin, who thought that any woman that wanted to be a stay at home mom was just taking the easy way out. So he is currently spending a week in his wives body.

“So what do you think?” Michael asks, “It is amazing, but does it actually work?” he asks, Michael and a few other agents standing close enough to hear begin to laugh, “You would be surprised, I have seen some of the worst human beings change completely thanks to our efforts.” Michael says smiling

“But you can meet everyone and hear their stories later, it’s time for your orientation.” Michael says
1111.title: A Storage Facility

11111.content:
Aaron then follows Michael to a laboratory and introduces him to a woman in a lab coat, “Aaron, this is Dr. Swan our head of research and development.” He says, “So you must be our newest addition here to pick up his new toys.” She says smiling

“Yes ma’am and it’s an honor to meet the mind responsible for all this amazing tech.” Aaron says, “Oh you’re too kind, but I can’t take all the credit, the majority of our equipment was already here when I arrived. But working with it has allowed me to make many of my own breakthroughs.” She says proudly

“Alright enough flirting you two, show him the good stuff.” Michael says, “Of course, right this way.” She says leading them to a strange machine, “This is one of those breakthroughs I have mentioned. In the past all the procedures to prepare new recruits for this job would take time and discomfort, but with this machine it is quick and painless. Now if you would be so kind.” She says gesturing for him to step into the machine.

He was a little nervous at the idea that this was suppose to make something that sounded long and painful quick and easy but from what he had see he took a deep breath and decided to trust her. He then steps onto a platform beneath a bright light.

“Okay now stand still, this will only take a second.” She says activating the machine from a remote control.

Suddenly lights started spinning around the platform as the light above it started to get brighter until Aaron was enveloped in a warm light. Moments later the light dissipates.

“Alight you can come out now.” She says, Aaron leaves the machine looking himself up and down, “What’s wrong?” Michael asks, “Well I don’t feel any different.” He responds, “Well of course you don’t, quick and painless remember.” Dr. Swan says smiling, “Your body may feel the same but it has been through a lot. That machine has removed your fingerprints and made your DNA unreadable by normal means, it also gives you a visually recordable signal so that our computers can either wipe or manipulate any picture or video that you get caught in, and you can now speak and understand any lanuguage.” she says

The two of them then lead him to a table with different gadgets on it.

“Okay now the fun part; this is your standard issue control pad. It allows you to easily manipulate a selected target or yourself if need be. You just select a target like so,” she says selecting Michael on the screen, “And then select a manipulation option, like age.” She says adjusting Michael’s age to six years old, you then watch as he changes to a six year old boy. Michael then turns so you can see the full transformation, “And as you can see his clothes changed with him, and you can change the clothing options as well but they are on default right now. And to return the subjects to normal just press this button.” She says pressing the button and returning him to normal, “But Mike will show you more about that later, next we have your memory band.” She says handing you a watch like Michael’s.

“Now just like the control pad you can set this for a specific target, or a distance around you and then set it for a certain amount of time. Press this button and then their memory will be wiped.” She says


“Alright now that is all the beginner equipment you will need from me for the time being. But come back and see me sometime.” She says winking at him. “Ah thanks.” He says as Michael leads him out of the lab.

“So if this is beginner stuff, what do I get when I’m not a beginner anymore?” he asks, “Let’s just take things one step at a time.” He says, “Now next up is a brief rules and regulations seminar.” He says leading him into a classroom with a man in a lab coat.
11111.title: Pick up his Equipment

111111.content:
Aaron is then lead into a classroom, “Hey there I am Dr. Reeves, you must be our latest prospects.” He says shaking his hand, “Ah yes sir.” He says smiling.

“Welcome to the Bureau, now if you are here I take it you are already familiar with the principles of psychology and sociology?” he asks, “Yes I just delivered my thesis earlier this afternoon.” He says, “Wait, are you Aaron Walker?” he ask, “That’s me.” He says humbly, “Splendid, I look forward to discussing your views on sociological development.

“Thank you, so you’re familiar with my work?” he asks, “Why of course, a mind like yours is what we look for.” He says

“Now to business, I’m sure Mike has informed you that he will be your mentor, and will be there if you have any questions. We find that on the job is the best way to learn. Though if you would like to discuss different transformation strategies with other agents there is a meeting in conference Room A every Wednesday. But for now here is how it works; our system monitors the behavior of everyone within close proximity of any wireless device. And if someone displays intolerance of others that our system deems extreme and worthy of our intervention it is reported and assigned to an agent. The agent then decides how to handle the situation.” He says,

“Wow you must stay pretty busy around here.” Aaron says, “Yes, but multiple cases can be assigned to one agent and this is only one instillation. Our organization is spread around the world.” Michael says

“And with your educational background and Mike’s guidance you probably already have an idea of how you would handle certain cases, and you will be assigned cases of your own, though if you have trouble with one you can trade it or give it to other agents. And you will see that all of our cases are of eighteen years and older. Parents have the right to try and straighten their children out but once they are legal they are our problem.” He says

“So just listen to Mike and everything will be fine, though I will warn you that with the level of power and the task we are given comes great responsibility. And any agent caught abusing their power will face appropriate consequences.” He says seriously, “But I’ve got a good feeling about you, so don’t worry.” He says smiling, “Now if you ever need anything my office is always open.” Dr. Reeves say as they leave the room.

“Wow everyone sure is friendly around here.” Aaron says, “Yeah, we found that it generally takes someone with a good heart to do our kind of work. I mean with our kind of power the wrong person could do some pretty bad things.” Michael says

“Well here you go,” he says gesturing an empty desk right next to his. “This is your desk, here you can research cases and refer back to other case.” He says, “Now enjoy the site of an empty desk while you can, once you’re on your own it is going to be covered with case files.” He says laughing

Aaron then sits down at his desk familiarizing himself with his area, “But it’s getting late so I’m sure you’re ready to see where you will be living when you’re not working.” Michael says, “Okay lead the way.” He says

Michael then takes him to a broom closet sized room, “Alright here we are.” He says smiling, “This better be like the bench.” Aaron says smiling as the two of them squeeze into the small space and close the door, and suddenly they were standing in the kitchen of a fully furnished studio apartment complete with an ocean view. “Now this is what I’m talking about.” Aaron says, he then looks around to see moving boxes in the living room with all of his stuff in them.

“Well get some sleep, tomorrow is going to be a busy day.” Michael says walking out of the front door.
111111.title: Continue

choices: Follow Up on one of Mikes Current Cases
1111111.content:
So much had happened in such a short time, Aaron’s mind was racing but he decided to calm down and get some sleep.

The next morning he wakes up, puts on a pair of pajama pants and walks to the kitchen. Just then he realized that no one told him what time he had to be at work, or even how to use his front door.

“Moring, Coffee?” he hears, breaking his concentration. He then looks up to see Michael sitting at his kitchen table drinking coffee and reading the news paper.

“Ah he Michael, I didn’t hear you come in…” he says awkwardly, “Hey we’re partners now, call me Mike. So you want any coffee?” he asks

“No thanks I’m good, so ah… how long have you been here?” Aaron asks, “Not long, and sorry about that, but when I got back to my place I realized you don’t know how to use your front door. So I had to get here before you tried otherwise you could have ended up in the middle of the dessert, or the ocean.” He says laughing,

“Wow well in that case thanks, but wait you mean that door can send me anywhere in the world?” Aaron asks, “Well with the exception of a few dangerous or high security destinations, yes. But until you get the hang of it I would just keep it local.” He says

“Now get ready, we have a long day and you have a lot to learn.” He says

“Okay ill go jump in the shower, so is there any kind of dress code or anything?” Aaron asks, “Well just put on something comfortable and ill explain.” He says

Aaron quickly jumps in and out of the shower, brushes his teeth, and sorts through his boxes of clothes for a pair of khaki pants and a collared shirt. He then walks back into the kitchen where Mike is just finishing his coffee.

“Okay do you have your tech?” he asks, “Right here.” He says holding them up. “Okay first off, headquarters is just like any other office building, corporate casual or business wear. They say it’s a dress for success type thing while we are in the office. But the beauty of it is you can wake up and throw on pajama pants and a wrinkled shirt and just use your control pad to change your clothes. Here let me show you.” Mike says extending his hand for Aarons control pad.

Aaron gives him the pad. Mike then shows him how to choose the clothing option and select a target, he then selects a suit similar to Mike’s and changes his clothes to match.

“Wow that’s awesome.” He says, “Okay now for the door, just think of a place in detail, open the door and imagine taking one step from here to there, here you try.” He says

Aaron then steps up to the door and thinks about the door he used to get here the night before. He then opens the door and steps through. And he was instantly standing in the office, he smiles taking a moment enjoy the victory of easily accomplishing what Mike said was hard.

“Pretty cool isn’t it.” Mike says standing right behind him, making him jump. “And I know what you’re thinking, that wasn’t so hard, but if you lose concentration you could have easily ended up between dimensional space so baby steps okay?” he says smiling

“Alright now follow me to our desks and we will get things started.” Mike says guiding you back to your desk. Yours was still empty but there were multiple folders on his.

“Okay these are all cases I am either working on or have just been assigned to me. If you look through them you will see all kinds of information about their issues, history, and the progress of their transformation. So pick one and we will go from there.” he says

Aaron sorts through the folders, skimming the ones that caught his attention.

“Wow you must stay pretty busy.” He says, “Yeah, when the higher ups know you get the job done they keep finding work for you to do, but that’s the price of being good at what you do.” He says confidently, "So you found one you like yet?"
1111111.title: The Next Morning

choices: He has learned his lesson and honestly tells you about it
He gets pissed off and further modifications to his situation are required
11111111.content:
“Well since you’re the master why don’t you show me one of your current works in progress so I can get a better idea of how it works.” Aaron says

“Alright, the ones on the left are current cases, so pick one and we’ll get going.” He says pointing to a small stack of folders in the “In progress” tray.

Aaron turns to the left and begins looking through the folders, “Okay let’s see, we have a womanizer turned busty waitress, a deadbeat dad turned pregnant, bully turned little girl, and a couple that swapped bodies. Wow we can do all of that?” Aaron asks,

“Oh yeah, and much more, You see for some an initial swap is the wakeup call they need but some cases require even more... motivation." he says smiling, "Like take Jack the womanizer, first I made him a waitress thinking it would teach him a little humility, but I let him keep his nice apartment but that wasn’t working so I had to move him to a less desirable neighborhood, and then when that didn’t work I gave him double D-cups and put him of the late night shift.” He says laughing, “And that was a week ago so let’s see how he is doing now.” He says parking the car on the street in front of a small apartment building. They walk up stairs and knock on the door of apartment 213.

Moments later a busty attractive yet exhausted woman opens the door, and the second she sees Michael she lights up with excitement and ushered us inside.

“Oh thank god! Am I glad to see you, I’ve learned my lesson, please change me back.” She begs

“Hi Jack, I’d like to introduce you to Aaron, he is a new agent with the bureau. And I was hoping you could tell him a little bit about what a profound impact we have had on your life.” He says smiling
11111111.title: Follow Up on one of Mikes Current Cases

111111111.content:
Jack takes a deep breath sits down on the couch, “Kick back and relax because this is going to take a minute.” She says. You all have a seat around the coffee table.

“Okay first off, did I want this? Hell no! But did I need it, yeah probably. I never thought something like this was possible but I mean I used to be the man, or at least what I though the man was supposed to be like. And I guess along the way I pissed a lot of women off, and after spending the past month as one. I see that for the most part they have a good reason to think that we are all assholes.” He says

“Well kid I was hoping that you would have a chance to make things a little more interesting for Jack here but, it looks like he actually learned his lesson.” Michael says smiling

Jack then jumps up, “Wait does this mean you’re going to change me back?” he asks desperately, “Yes Sir, you did the crime, the time, and now you’re good to go.” He says taking out his controller. “Oh thank you so much, I won’t forget this.” He says, “Oh yes you will.” Michael says pressing a button.

Suddenly Jack disappears and the apartment is completely vacant as though no one has lived there for months.

“Wait what just happened?” Aaron asks, “I sent him back to his real life, rite now he is probably waking up in his office thinking that he just dosed off.” He says, “Wait so he will just think it was all a dream?” He asks, “Well sometimes they do.” He says, “But then what was the point if he isn’t going to remember?” he asks, Michael then smiles and says, “Well it depends on what you mean by remember, the conversation we just had may fade from his memory like a dream, but his heart will always remember that month he spent getting hit on by the same jerks that he used to be.” He says, “And if he ever forgets, I’m going to make him a stripper with E-cups.” He says smiling

Aaron stands there for a moment looking at the vacant apartment still trying to wrap his mind around everything that just happened

“Come on, that’s just one down, we’ve got other appointments to make.” He says, “Oh right.” Aaron says following him out the door and back to the car.


“Okay where to next?” he asks

info.brief_description: A top secret organization teaches people a lesson by transforming them.
info.description:
Okay this is my take on the Men in Black of TG transformations. The main character is recruited by a top secret organization that uses transformations and body swapping to teach the inconsiderate, prejudice, and narrow-minded people of the world a lesson in consideration so that humanity can grow as a whole. And I know that sounds like a serious mission but don’t worry, it’s the same TG experience as any other story just a different perspective on it.

So as an agent he will visit different individuals in desperate need of an attitude adjustment and must decide how to teach him a lesson. Whether it be through a gender change, age regression, body swap, or anything else he can think of.

Right now I’m not going to worry so much about rules but I do reserve the right to remove anything I believe to be inappropriate or just a pointless filler

Enjoy :)
